title: Kan fak zel dawn
lyrics:
Riangvai saltang chhuahna turin,
Isua Krista a lo vakvai;
Tihduhdah tuar, rethei riangvai,
Isuan kraws-ah min hnehsak ta.

Halleluiah, Halleluiah,
Lalpan thil ropui min tihsak e!
Tawtawrawt leh Phenglawng rite nen;
Darbenthek ri thum leh fiakin,
Perhkhuang tingtang chi hrang hrang nen,
Khuangte leh lamin kan fak zel dawn.

Hmangaihnaa min zawng chhuaktu,
Ka rul seng lo’ng hring chan chhungin,
Misual dum ber min silfai ta,
Chatuan nunna ka lo nei ta.

Ringtu zawngte, kal zel ila,
Lalpa hming thianghlim ropui chu;
“A thianghlim e,” ti a auvin,
Kan theihtawpin kan fak zel dawn.
